bug_report.label: Bug
bug_report.aria_label: Report a bug or request a feature
bug_report.tooltip: Report a bug or request a feature

language.label: Language
language.description: Select your preferred language for the interface.
language.help_text: Translations are AI-generated. Help us improve by contributing on <0>GitHub</0>!

connection_failed.title: Connection Failed
connection_failed.message: Failed to connect to Ollama. Is the server running?

no_models.title: No Models Found
no_models.message: Please pull a model to get started

ready.title: Ready to Chat
ready.message: Ollama is connected and ready to use

setup_guide.intro: Before you start, follow these quick steps:
setup_guide.step2: Run ollama run llama3 or any model

performance_notice.title: ⚠️ Performance Notice
performance_notice.message: This extension is a user interface for your local Ollama server. Response time and model output quality depend entirely on your device's hardware (CPU, RAM, GPU) and the specific model you're using. No processing is done by the extension itself.

input.rag_toggle_tooltip: Smart Context (Beta): Use file & chat context

session_metrics.tooltip_tokens: Total tokens used in this session

search.dialog_description: Search your chat history by meaning, not just keywords
search.no_results: No results found. Try a different search query.
search.start_typing: Start typing to search your chat history semantically...

backfill.title: Backfill Chat History
backfill.description: Generate embeddings for all existing chat messages to enable semantic search
backfill.info_sessions: • This will process all messages from {{count}} {{sessions}}
backfill.info_min_chars: • Only messages with at least 10 characters will be embedded
backfill.info_time_warning: • This may take a while depending on the number of messages

voice_selector.search_placeholder: Search by name, language, or URI...
voice_selector.no_voices_available: No voices available on this device

settings.max_file_size_description: Maximum allowed size for individual files. Larger files may take longer to process.

embedding_status.required_for_rag: The embedding model is required for RAG features.

site_overrides.title: Site-Specific Overrides
site_overrides.description: Configure custom extraction settings for specific sites using regex patterns
site_overrides.no_overrides_hint: Add patterns to customize extraction settings for specific sites

exclude_urls.title: Excluded URLs
exclude_urls.description: Block extension access from sensitive pages using regex patterns
exclude_urls.examples: Use regular expressions to match URLs. Examples: <0>^https://bank\.</0> or <0>.*\.private\..*</0>

embedding_config.database_management_description: Clean up and manage your vector embeddings database
embedding_config.remove_duplicates_description: Remove duplicate embeddings, keeping only the first occurrence of each unique message
embedding_config.clear_chat_description: Delete all chat embeddings. You can backfill later to regenerate them
embedding_config.clear_all_description: Delete all embeddings (chats, files, webpages). This action cannot be undone
embedding_config.chunking_description: Configure how text is split into chunks for embedding
embedding_config.chunk_size_description: Number of tokens per chunk. Larger chunks preserve more context but may be less focused.
embedding_config.chunk_overlap_description: Overlap between chunks. Helps preserve context across chunk boundaries.
embedding_config.chunking_strategy_description: How to split text into chunks. Hybrid provides the best balance of context and focus.
embedding_config.batch_size_description: Number of texts to embed in parallel. Higher values are faster but use more memory.
embedding_config.enable_caching_description: Cache embeddings for identical content to avoid regenerating
embedding_config.use_webworker_description: Offload embedding generation to background thread (recommended)
embedding_config.limits_description: Configure storage limits and cleanup policies
embedding_config.max_embeddings_description: Maximum embeddings per file (0 = unlimited). Helps prevent memory issues with very large files.
embedding_config.max_storage_description: Maximum storage size in MB (0 = unlimited). Oldest vectors will be deleted when limit is reached.
embedding_config.cleanup_age_description: Delete embeddings older than this many days
embedding_config.chat_search_description: Configure semantic search for chat history
embedding_config.auto_embed_description: Automatically embed chat messages for semantic search (recommended)
embedding_config.backfill_description: Generate embeddings for all existing chat messages to enable semantic search
embedding_config.search_limit_description: Default number of results to return from semantic search
embedding_config.min_similarity_description: Minimum cosine similarity score (0-1). For semantic search, 0.4-0.6 is recommended. Higher values return more relevant but fewer results.
embedding_config.cache_ttl_description: How long to cache search results (1-60 minutes). Cached queries return instantly.
embedding_config.cache_max_size_description: Maximum number of search queries to cache (10-200). Older entries are automatically removed when limit is reached.
embedding_config.enhanced_chunking_description: Use advanced recursive character splitting for better context
embedding_config.enhanced_chunking_info: Enhanced chunking splits text hierarchically (paragraphs → sentences → words) to preserve semantic meaning. This is recommended for RAG.
embedding_config.rag_settings_description: Configure how files are used to answer questions with retrieved context
embedding_config.rag_enable_description: Use retrieved context to answer questions about your files
embedding_config.rag_system_prompt_description: Template for the system prompt. Use {context} for retrieved text and {question} for the user query.

selector.title: Prompt Templates
selector.description: Choose from {{count}} templates to jump start your conversation
selector.no_templates_search: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
selector.no_templates_empty: No prompt templates are available. Create your first template in settings.

selector.title: Chat Sessions
selector.no_sessions_hint: Create your first chat to get started

chat_display.title: Chat Display
chat_display.description: Configure how chat information is displayed
chat_display.session_metrics_description: Display token usage, duration, and speed above the chat input

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Customize keyboard shortcuts for quick access to features.
shortcuts.toggle_theme_desc: Switch between light and dark mode
shortcuts.toggle_speech_desc: Start or stop speaking the last AI response
shortcuts.copy_last_response_desc: Copy the last AI response to clipboard
shortcuts.toggle_session_metrics_desc: Show or hide the session metrics bar
shortcuts.export_json_desc: Export current chat as JSON file
shortcuts.export_markdown_desc: Export current chat as Markdown file
shortcuts.export_pdf_desc: Export current chat as PDF file
shortcuts.export_text_desc: Export current chat as plain text file

content_extraction.title: Content Extraction
content_extraction.description: Configure default content extraction behavior for all websites.

enable.label: Allow content extraction
enable.description: Enable enhanced content extraction with lazy loading support

selection_button.label: Show "Ask Ollama Client" button after selection
selection_button.description: Show a floating action button when selecting text to speed up adding it to chat

auto.label: Auto
auto.detail: Good for most sites. Uses Defuddle first for improved markdown and code formatting, falls back to Readability if necessary.

defuddle.label: Defuddle
defuddle.detail: Best for GitHub, documentation, Stack Overflow, and developer blogs. Preserves code blocks and markdown structure.

readability.label: Readability
readability.detail: Suitable for news articles, Medium posts, and traditional blog content.

scroll_strategy.label: Scroll Strategy
scroll_strategy.none: Fastest extraction, lazy loading not supported
scroll_strategy.instant: Fast scrolling works well for simple lazy loading
scroll_strategy.gradual: Balanced smooth scrolling with deliberate pauses and a mix of speed and precision

scroll_depth.label: Scroll Depth
scroll_depth.description: Percentage of page to scroll (higher = more content, slower)

system.title: System Configuration
system.description: Configure system prompts and stop sequences to control model behavior.
system.prompt_placeholder: Enter a custom system prompt to guide the model's behavior...

base_url.title: Ollama Base URL
base_url.description: Configure the server endpoint for your Ollama installation.
base_url.label: Ollama API Server Endpoint

model_pull.title: Model Library
model_pull.description: Browse and download AI models for your projects.
model_pull.search_placeholder: Search for models by name or description...

delete_dialog.title: Delete this model?
delete_dialog.description: This action cannot be undone. The model will be permanently removed from your local system.

model_info.title: Model Information
model_info.no_data: No data available for this model.

loaded_models.title: Loaded Models
loaded_models.no_models_title: No models currently loaded in memory
loaded_models.no_models_description: Models will appear here when loaded.

memory.title: Contextual Memory
memory.description: Allow the AI to remember details from past conversations to provide personalized responses.

enable.label: Enable Memory
enable.description: When enabled, chat history is stored locally and used to provide context.

clear.label: Clear Memory
clear.confirm_dialog: Are you sure you want to clear all chat memory? This cannot be undone.

page.title: Ollama Client Settings
page.description: Manage all aspects of your Ollama setup in one place. For tips and setup guidance, visit the Guides tab.

speech.title: Speech Settings
speech.description: Configure your text-to-speech voice, speed, and tone settings.
speech.test_text_placeholder: Test your voice settings by typing here...
speech.test_hint_text: Click "Test Voice" to hear your text.
speech.test_hint_default: Click "Test Voice" to hear the default sample.
speech.test_fallback: Hello, this is a test of your speech settings.

developer.title: Developer Settings
developer.logLevelDescription: Set the minimum level of logs to capture. Lower levels show more detail.
developer.enableLoggerDescription: Turn off logging to improve performance if experiencing issues
developer.persistLogsDescription: Store logs in IndexedDB for persistence across browser restarts (recommended)
developer.confirmClear: Are you sure you want to clear all logs?

troubleshooting.title: Need Help?
troubleshooting.description: If you're experiencing issues, export logs and include them in your bug report. This helps us debug your problem faster.

developer.confirmCrash: This will crash the application to test the Error Boundary. Are you sure?
developer.manualCrashError: Manual Crash Test from Developer Settings

embeddings.title: Vector Embeddings
embeddings.description: Embeddings enable semantic search, retrieval augmented generation, and context-aware features for file uploads and chat history.

not_loaded.title: Embedding model not loaded
not_loaded.description: The embedding model is required for semantic search, RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation), and context-aware features. Download it now to enhance your chat experience with better context understanding and file search capabilities.

success.title: Download successful
success.description: The embedding model is now ready to use. You can now enjoy enhanced chat experiences with semantic search and context-aware features.

auto_downloaded.title: Auto-installed
auto_downloaded.description: The embedding model was automatically downloaded when you installed the extension.

test_generation.title: Test Embedding Generation
test_generation.description: Generate a test embedding to verify the embedding model is working correctly.

rebuild_index.title: Rebuild Keyword Index
rebuild_index.description: Force a rebuild of the keyword search index from existing vectors. Use this if search results are missing or inconsistent.
rebuild_index.error: Failed to rebuild index. Please try again.

test_search.title: Semantic Search
test_search.description: Verify your uploaded files are accessible and searchable. Enter a search query to find matching content.
test_search.no_results: No results found. Try a different search or upload more content.

what_are_embeddings.title: What are Embeddings?
what_are_embeddings.point_1: Convert text into numerical vectors that capture semantic meaning
what_are_embeddings.point_2: Enable semantic search across your chat history and uploaded files
what_are_embeddings.point_4: Provide relevant context from your files to improve AI responses

rag_mode.label: Smart Context (RAG)
rag_mode.description: Use semantic search to find relevant context from your files instead of sending the entire file content.

model_select.label: Embedding Model
model_select.description: Choose a model to generate embeddings. You may need to download it first.

prompts.title: Prompt Templates
prompts.description: Manage your collection of {{count}} prompt templates.

reset_dialog.title: Reset templates to defaults?
reset_dialog.description: This will replace all of your current templates with the default ones. This action cannot be undone.

form.title: Title
form.description_placeholder: A brief description of the template's purpose and functionality.

delete_dialog.title: Delete template
delete_dialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.

reset.title: Reset Settings
reset.description: Clear stored data by module or reset everything to defaults

danger_zone.title: Danger Zone
danger_zone.description: This will clear all data and cannot be undone

dialog.title: Confirm Reset
dialog.description: This will clear all data and cannot be undone.

guides.title: Helpful Guides & Documentation
guides.description: Need help setting up Ollama Client or exploring features? Check out these useful resources

support.title: Support the Project
support.description: Help us grow by featuring Ollama Client on Product Hunt
support.image_alt: Ollama Client - Chat with local LLMs — right inside your browser | Product Hunt

library.label: Official Ollama Model Library
library.description: Browse available AI models and documentation

github.label: GitHub Repo
github.description: Source code, releases, and contribution guidelines

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: An unexpected error occurred. We've logged this issue internally.
